explains: adj. 多山丘的，丘陵起伏的

sentences.en: The agricultural land is hilly and the irrigation poor.
sentences.cn: 这片农田多丘陵，而且灌溉条件很差。

sentences.en: The areas where the fighting is taking place are hilly and densely wooded.
sentences.cn: 战斗发生的地区丘陵起伏，树木茂密。

sentences.en: Well, what I mean is the area is very hilly, mountainous in parts.
sentences.cn: 好吧，我的意思是这是一个多丘陵，部分多山的地区。
